name: Tumblr Icon Top hats
description:
Increases Dapper Levels of all icons on your dash!

As part of Tumblr's 2014 "april fools joke" anyone who opted into Tumblr Pro recevied a Top hat above their icon. It has since been removed. This style will put a top hat on all icons on your dashboard.
additional_info:
credit to tin-pan-ali on tumblr for the top hat resource.

update 11/18/15
fixed hat so it is now back on top the avatar again. and scrolls with the icon
